00008 #include <sensors/sensors.h>
00009 #include <string>
00010 #include <oryx_msgs/Temperature.h>
00011 #include <ros/ros.h>
00012 ros::Publisher temperaturePublisher;
00013 double dangerTemp,warningTemp;
00014 
00015 
00016 using namespace std;
00017 
00018 void getTemps(){
00019         sensors_chip_name const *cn;
00020     int c = 0;
00021 
00022     //This is the name of the subfeature we are looking for
00023         std::string tempName = "temp1_input";
00024 
00025         //This finds each of the cores
00026     while ((cn = sensors_get_detected_chips(0, &c)) != 0){
00027         sensors_feature const *feat;
00028         int f = 0;
00029 
00030         // Because libsensors doesn't know what each sensor is, features
00031         // stores the type (temp, voltage, fan, etc) of each sensor
00032         while ((feat = sensors_get_features(cn, &f)) != 0) {
00033 
00034             sensors_subfeature const *subf;
00035             int s = 0;
00036 
00037             //Subfeatures are the different calls available to each feature
00038             //These include temperature, max temperature, etc.
00039             while ((subf = sensors_get_all_subfeatures(cn, feat, &s)) != 0) {
00040                if(subf->name == tempName){
00041                 double val;
00042                 if (subf->flags & SENSORS_MODE_R) {
00043 
00044                         //Here is where the temperature is grabbed
00045                     int rc = sensors_get_value(cn, subf->number, &val);
00046                     if (rc < 0) {
00047                        ROS_WARN_STREAM("Invalid Sensor reading: " << rc);
00048                     } else {
00049                         oryx_msgs::Temperature msg;
00050                         msg.temperature_node=c+10;
00051                         //Convert temperatures to fahrenheit
00052                         msg.warning_Temp=warningTemp;
00053                         msg.danger_Temp=dangerTemp;
00054                         msg.temperature=val*9/5+32;
00055                         temperaturePublisher.publish(msg);
00056                     }
00057                 }
00058                }
00059 
00060             }
00061         }
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 int main(int argc, char** argv){
00067         ros::init(argc, argv, "cpuTemps");
00068         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00069         double publishRate=1;
00070         dangerTemp = 80*9/5+32;
00071         warningTemp = 70*9/5+32;
00072 
00073         ros::param::get("~Warning_Temp",warningTemp);
00074         ros::param::get("~Danger_Temp",dangerTemp);
00075         ros::param::get("~Publish_Rate",publishRate);
00076 
00077         temperaturePublisher = nh.advertise<oryx_msgs::Temperature>("Temps",10);
00078         ros::Rate loopRate(publishRate);
00079 
00080     sensors_cleanup();
00081     sensors_init(NULL);
00082 
00083     while(nh.ok()){
00084 
00085         getTemps();
00086         loopRate.sleep();
00087         ros::spinOnce();
00088     }
00089 
00090 
00091 }
